abstract: Brian Seibert reviews performance by hula dance troupe Na Kinimakalehua at Kasser Theater of Montclair State University.
snippet: Richard Perry/The New York Times At Montclair State University, a group brought traditional Hawaiian hula from Maui, in dance and narration.
lead_paragraph: Richard Perry/The New York Times At Montclair State University, a group brought traditional Hawaiian hula from Maui, in dance and narration.

headline.main: Hawaii’s Traditions, Retold in Words and Movement
headline.print_headline: Hawaii’s Traditions, Retold in Words and Movement
headline.seo: Hula by Na Kinimakalehua at Montclair State - Review
